On day 3 embryo culture , Eeva blastocyst prediction data print system use assist embryologist select best embryo ( ) . The performance system summarize user feedback embryologist collect .
DOC.criteria: Women undergo fresh vitro fertilization treatment use egg donor egg Subject ≥ 18 ≤ 40 year age . Subject basal antral follicle count ( AFC ) ≥ 8 prior stimulation cycle . Fertilization use ejaculated sperm ( fresh frozen ) surgically retrieve sperm . Subject ≥ 5 normally fertilize egg ( 2 PN ) Willing 2PN embryo monitor Eeva Willing comply study protocol procedure able speak English . Willing provide write informed consent . Reinseminated egg . History cancer . Gestational carrier . Planned preimplantation genetic diagnosis preimplantation genetic screening . Previously enrol study Concurrent participation another clinical study .
